title: Voltskiya
description: Developed Minecraft plugins to create a unique experience in a survival server.
summary: Developed an extensive library of mob abilities so 'GameMasters' (staff) can mix and match to create new mobs.
Developed a series of game features such as Temperature, Thirst, Stamina, and skill points.
Developed a MobSystem with customizable spawning contexts that pregenerates 50k mobs to fill the map.
comments: Working to develop for an ever-changing environment taught me the importance of writing code that leaves room for expansion
